item.description:
Come learn to dance and have fun. Hartford Swing Dance holds a swing dance with live music on the first Friday of every month at the West Hartford Town Hall. A beginner East Cost Swing dance lession is provided from 7:30 pm to 8:30 pm with general dancing afterwards until 11:30 pm. All dances are alcohol- and smoke-free.

This is a reoccurring meetup event for the first Friday of each month.

Admission ($12)

Location:
West Hartford Town Hall
50 South Main Street, West Hartford, CT
item.how_to_find_us: Please Be on the Lookout for Each Other

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Swing Dance with Live Music
